---
title: "Terrain Integrated Rough-Earth Model (TIREM) - C#/.NET"
---
# Overview

## Getting Started

To begin, install the NuGet package, `TIREM`, from the NTIA NuGet repository

![tirem nuget install screenshot](images/nuget_tirem.jpg)

All of the below code snippets requires the including the following `using` statement.

```csharp
using ITS.Propagation;
```

## Documentation

The `tirem` library is packaged to support IntelliSense when developing in Visual Studio.  This documentation will provide the developer with information on function descriptions, variable details, etc.

# Examples

**Note:** These examples use an artificial terrain profile.

## Basic Transmission Loss

```csharp
var heights = new[] { 4.5, 7, 3.6, 8, 10, 5 };
var dists = new[] { 0.0, 10000, 20000, 30000, 70000, 200000 };

double h_tx__meter = 5;
double h_rx__meter = 6;
double f__mhz = 1755;
double N_s = 301;
double sigma = 0.005;
double epsilon = 15;
double humid = 50;

TIREM.Invoke(h_tx__meter, h_rx__meter, f__mhz, heights, dists, 
    N_s, sigma, epsilon, humid, TIREM.Polarization.Vertical,
    out double A__db, out double A_fs__db, 
    out TIREM.TiremPropagationMode mode);

// A__db = 204.60               // basic transmission loss, in dB
// A_fs__db = 143.35            // free space loss, in dB
// mode = Troposcatter
```

## Absorption Loss

```csharp
var heights = new[] { 4.5, 7, 3.6, 8, 10, 5 };
var dists = new[] { 0.0, 10000, 20000, 30000, 70000, 200000 };

double h_tx__meter = 5;
double h_rx__meter = 6;
double f__mhz = 1755;
double N_s = 301;
double sigma = 0.005;
double epsilon = 15;
double humid = 50;

TIREM.Invoke(h_tx__meter, h_rx__meter, f__mhz, heights, dists, 
    N_s, sigma, epsilon, humid, TIREM.Polarization.Vertical,
    out double A__db, out double A_fs__db, 
    out TIREM.TiremPropagationMode mode);

// A__db = 204.60               // basic transmission loss, in dB
// A_fs__db = 143.35            // free space loss, in dB
// mode = Troposcatter

double abloss = TIREM.GetTiremAbloss();

// abloss = 0                   // absorption loss, in dB
```

## Diffraction Loss

```csharp
var heights = new[] { 4.5, 7, 50, 8, 10 };
var dists = new[] { 0.0, 10000, 20000, 30000, 70000 };

double h_tx__meter = 5;
double h_rx__meter = 6;
double f__mhz = 1755;
double N_s = 301;
double sigma = 0.005;
double epsilon = 15;
double humid = 50;

TIREM.Invoke(h_tx__meter, h_rx__meter, f__mhz, heights, dists, 
    N_s, sigma, epsilon, humid, TIREM.Polarization.Vertical,
    out double A__db, out double A_fs__db, 
    out TIREM.TiremPropagationMode mode);

// A__db = 168.82               // basic transmission loss, in dB
// A_fs__db = 134.23            // free space loss, in dB
// mode = Diffraction

double totdif = TIREM.GetTiremTotdif();

// totdif = 168.82              // diffraction loss, in dB

// you can also get the diffraction loss for a troposcatter path
var heights2 = new[] { 4.5, 7, 3.6, 8, 10, 5 };
var dists2 = new[] { 0.0, 10000, 20000, 30000, 70000, 200000 };

TIREM.Invoke(h_tx__meter, h_rx__meter, f__mhz, heights2, dists2, 
    N_s, sigma, epsilon, humid, TIREM.Polarization.Vertical,
    out double A__db2, out double A_fs__db2, 
    out TIREM.TiremPropagationMode mode2);

// A__db2 = 204.60              // basic transmission loss, in dB
// A_fs__db2 = 143.35           // free space loss, in dB
// mode2 = Troposcatter

double totdif2 = TIREM.GetTiremTotdif();

// totdif2 = 208.20             // diffraction loss, in dB
```

## Troposcatter Loss

```csharp
var heights = new[] { 4.5, 7, 3.6, 8, 10, 5 };
var dists = new[] { 0.0, 10000, 20000, 30000, 70000, 200000 };

double h_tx__meter = 5;
double h_rx__meter = 6;
double f__mhz = 1755;
double N_s = 301;
double sigma = 0.005;
double epsilon = 15;
double humid = 50;

TIREM.Invoke(h_tx__meter, h_rx__meter, f__mhz, heights, dists,
    N_s, sigma, epsilon, humid, TIREM.Polarization.Vertical,
    out double A__db, out double A_fs__db,
    out TIREM.TiremPropagationMode mode);

// A__db = 204.60               // basic transmission loss, in dB
// A_fs__db = 143.35            // free space loss, in dB
// mode = Troposcatter

double tottro = TIREM.GetTiremTottro();

// tottro = 204.60              // troposcatter loss, in dB

// you can also get the troposcatter loss for a diffraction path
var heights2 = new[] { 4.5, 7, 50, 8, 10 };
var dists2 = new[] { 0.0, 10000, 20000, 30000, 70000 };

TIREM.Invoke(h_tx__meter, h_rx__meter, f__mhz, heights2, dists2,
    N_s, sigma, epsilon, humid, TIREM.Polarization.Vertical,
    out double A__db2, out double A_fs__db2,
    out TIREM.TiremPropagationMode mode2);

// A__db2 = 168.82              // basic transmission loss, in dB
// A_fs__db2 = 134.23           // free space loss, in dB
// mode2 = Diffraction

double tottro2 = TIREM.GetTiremTottro();

// tottro2 = 192.23             // diffraction loss, in dB
```

## TX Troposcatter Angle

```csharp
var heights = new[] { 4.5, 7, 3.6, 8, 10, 5 };
var dists = new[] { 0.0, 10000, 20000, 30000, 70000, 200000 };

double h_tx__meter = 5;
double h_rx__meter = 6;
double f__mhz = 1755;
double N_s = 301;
double sigma = 0.005;
double epsilon = 15;
double humid = 50;

TIREM.Invoke(h_tx__meter, h_rx__meter, f__mhz, heights, dists,
    N_s, sigma, epsilon, humid, TIREM.Polarization.Vertical,
    out double A__db, out double A_fs__db,
    out TIREM.TiremPropagationMode mode);

// A__db = 204.60               // basic transmission loss, in dB
// A_fs__db = 143.35            // free space loss, in dB
// mode = Troposcatter

double alphae = TIREM.GetTiremAlphae();

// alphae = 0.010916            // tx troposcatter angle, in radians
```

## TX Horizon Index

```csharp
var heights = new[] { 4.5, 7, 3.6, 8, 10, 5 };
var dists = new[] { 0.0, 10000, 20000, 30000, 70000, 200000 };

double h_tx__meter = 5;
double h_rx__meter = 6;
double f__mhz = 1755;
double N_s = 301;
double sigma = 0.005;
double epsilon = 15;
double humid = 50;

TIREM.Invoke(h_tx__meter, h_rx__meter, f__mhz, heights, dists,
    N_s, sigma, epsilon, humid, TIREM.Polarization.Vertical,
    out double A__db, out double A_fs__db,
    out TIREM.TiremPropagationMode mode);

// A__db = 204.60               // basic transmission loss, in dB
// A_fs__db = 143.35            // free space loss, in dB
// mode = Troposcatter

int horztx = TIREM.GetTiremHorztx();

// horztx = 1
// tx horizon point is dists[1] and heights[1]
```
